answers.answer: My dr usually does it around 28wks so I would probably mention it to them. Good luck!

question: I'm 24 weeks pregnant my next appointment isn't until I'm 27 weeks. This is my 2nd pregnancy and I was negative for the test (gestational diabetes) my doc hasn't mentioned anything about the test and I remember with my first I had to take the drink home with instructions for my next appointment.  Is this normal or should I mention something?  I realize I've been there done that but it's been 3 years. I've slept since then! Lol
title: GTT test gestational diabetes
